name: Task Vault
desc: A productivity tool to manage and track your daily tasks efficiently. Features include task creation, deadlines, reminders, and a clean UI for easy organization.

name: YouTube Transcript Summarizer
desc: A web app that fetches YouTube video transcripts and generates concise summaries using AI. Built with React and OpenAI API integration.

name: Voice Tool
desc: A voice assistant web tool that recognizes speech and performs actions like searching, note-taking, and more. Built with JavaScript and Web Speech API.
